name: Black Hole Demise
description:
You get pushed of a mountain and cursed with a black hole spell, that will comsume you in the future. Don't let all of this distract you. You just want to see her again.

Controls:

  • Move with A/D, the arrow keys or the left stick
  • Jump with Space (keyboard) or B (controller)
  • Unleash your black hole with left shift or the left trigger
  • Interact with objects with E (keyboard) or Y (controller)
  • Restart from the most recent checkpoint with R (keyboard) or X (controller)
